column4: Does anyone know how to make an ubuntu minimal install boot to something other than a blank black screen?
what kind of video card are you using?
wait, getting a head of myself, try pressing ctrl-alt-f2 to get to a terminal ;)
intel onboard and a geforce fx5200 pci card. 3 monitors connected.
where should i put nomodeset? at the very end of the grub command?
nope, thats the initrd line, add it before the -- on the previous line
thank you very much sir. so I'll just edit my grub line to have "nomodeset" on it
dont forget that, youll need it al the time
why is that? i dont have video drivers installed yet, i'm guessing.
the kernel is now responsible for setting the video mode, however the older drivers still think its taken care of by X
